title: Handle missing newline warning

promptHistory.text: Explain how to temporarily silence the React Hook dependency warning for a callback in useEffect.
This file is missing a trailing newline; suggest the quickest way to fix it from the CLI.

content: """Append a single newline when the file does not already end with one."""

notes: Artifacts are derived from User/History/<hash>/snapshot files; prompts originate from aiService.prompts.
